member.name: T:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card
member.summary: Represents a card object from the web api.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Name
member.summary: The name of the card.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Id
member.summary: The internal identification number that the card is given. Used to query for this single card.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Set
member.summary: Reduced information about the set the card belongs to.
member.remarks: May contain basic information only. ItÂ´s recommended to fetch the fully separately.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Types
member.summary: The energy type of types the card is.
member.remarks: Almost always will be a single value.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Hp
member.summary: The amount of HP the card has.
member.remarks: If the card does not have HP, the value will be -1.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.EvolvesFrom
member.summary: If the card evolves from another card, this field will denote the name of the pre-evolution.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Rules
member.summary: Describes rules the card is bound to. Mainly for cards with a rule box and certain Trainers.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Prices
member.summary: A list of known prices for this card.
member.remarks: May contain entries from different sellers, versions and conditions.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.RetreatCosts
member.summary: List of the energies required to retreat.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.ConvertedRetreatCost
member.summary: The total number of energies needed to retreat.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Supertype
member.summary: The supertype the card is.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Subtypes
member.summary: The subsets that the card falls into. For example 'Single Strike Pokemon', 'Pokemon VMAX', etc.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Rarity
member.summary: The rarity of the card.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Artist
member.summary: The card art's artist.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.ImageUrl
member.summary: The url pointing to the card's image.
member.remarks: If there is no card image, then this will instead point to https://assets.tcgcollector.com/build/images/default-card-image.789f6232.png.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.CardUrl
member.summary: The URL which leads to the original card URL data.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Number
member.summary: The sequential number of the card (applicable to Secret Rares).

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.PrintedNumber
member.summary: The number printed on the card. Will be the same as almost always. Is relevant for promotional cards, such as SWSH001.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Card.Uuid
member.summary: A stable id for earch card. Output is an eight digit integer which is unique for each card. While the cards' may change over time, the uuid should always remain stable and constant.

member.name: T:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice
member.summary: Contains information about card price.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.Version
member.summary: Specifies the card version. Almost always will be 'Regular' but may contain other versions like 'Reverse Holo', etc.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.Condition
member.summary: Specifies the card condition. Often will be a rating in format of 'A+', 'A', etc. but also can be 'NM' or other similar descriptive strings.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.Price
member.summary: The actual price for the specified version and condition.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.Currency
member.summary: The currency used for the .
member.remarks: Almost always will be 'JYP' for Japanese Yen.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.UpdatedDate
member.summary: Date when the price information was updated last.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.ListingUrl
member.summary: An URL to the listing.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.CardPrice.Seller
member.summary: Name of the seller who is listing the card.

member.name: T:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set
member.summary: Represents a set object from the web api.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.Name
member.summary: The name of the set.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.Id
member.summary: The internal identification number that the set is given. Used to query for information about this single set or for all cards in this single set.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.SourceUrl
member.summary: The URL to a page which has more information about the set.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.ImageUrl
member.summary: A URL to the official set's image.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.Language
member.summary: The language that the cards in the set are printed in.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.Year
member.summary: The year the set was released.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.TotalCardCount
member.summary: The total number of cards in the set.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.PrintedCardCount
member.summary: The number of cards in the set that is printed on the card. This differs from the set's in sets with Secret Rare cards.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.SetCode
member.summary: The shorthand code for the set.

member.name: P:JpnCardsPokemon.Sdk.Api.Set.Uuid
member.summary: A stable id for earch card. Output is an eight digit integer which is unique for each card. While the cards' may change over time, the uuid should always remain stable and constant.
